data.text: @edg_rocha @brumoro3 @charliegiattino @OurWorldInData Yes. Cancer and chemotherapy can weaken your immune system and increase your risk of mortality and vice versa. If your lungs are stable but compromised by COPD, a Covid-19 infection can be an aggravating factor leading to death. And so on.

@MarcRankin4 @brumoro3 @charliegiattino @OurWorldInData The contributed isn't something like an aggravating factor?
The analogy was if I was near a precipice and someone gave me a push?
@charliegiattino @jordanbpeterson @OurWorldInData Using the omicron timeline this chart would be upside down stop trying to mislead

@charliegiattino @jordanbpeterson @OurWorldInData In other words the data is manipulated and charts expanded to scare people! Are these deaths FROM Covid or deaths WITH Covid?? The CDC  has adjusted their counts to reflect deaths that Covid actually caused not those that died from car accidents, suicide etc. WITH Covid.misinfo!
@Jayfan34 @Apothegmata @charliegiattino @OurWorldInData It’s your hyperbole that fake. Obviously fed to you be CNN
@LProof777 @Apothegmata @charliegiattino @OurWorldInData Even calling the actual laws your governor signed fake news?  Do you only listen to JFK Jr. or something, lol.
@LProof777 @Apothegmata @charliegiattino @OurWorldInData lol, haven’t seen any CNN in years.  That would be the laws your governor signed.
